com.gmail.lepeska.martin.udplib

Class Datagrams

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gmail.lepeska.martin.udplib.Datagrams

  • public class Datagrams
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton designed for creating datagrams, GroupThreads are already long enough. DATAGRAM CONTENT(bytes): DATAGRAM_HEADER + DATAGRAM TYPE + message MESSAGE CONTENT(string): value1|value2|value3...

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte[] DATAGRAM_HEADER
      Start sequence of bytes, which identifies, that datagram is sent by UDPLib
      static java.lang.String DATAGRAM_HEADER_STRING
      Start sequence of bytes, which identifies, that datagram is sent by UDPLib
      static java.lang.String DELIMITER
      Special character, which marks certain parts of message
      static java.lang.String ENCODING 
      static int MAXIMUM_DATA_LENGTH
      Maximal safe datagram length = header#length#CONTENT

    • Method Detail

      • createDatagram

        public static byte[] createDatagram(Encryptor encryptor,
                                    java.lang.String message,
                                    DatagramTypes messageType)
        Creates UDPLib message datagram with given type. Private because of safety(messageType shouldn't be exposed) HEAD(N B)TYPE(1 B)#MESSAGE
        Parameters:
        encryptor - Encryptor of sending thread
        message - data to be sent
        messageType - identifies type of packet and role of sender
        Returns:
        data of UDPLib message datagram

      • createMessageDatagram

        public static byte[] createMessageDatagram(Encryptor encryptor,
                                           java.lang.String message,
                                           boolean isMulticast,
                                           AGroupThread thread)
        Creates UDPLib message datagram data.
        Parameters:
        encryptor - Encryptor of sending thread
        message - data to be sent
        thread - identifies role of sender
        isMulticast - true if message is to be sent to all group users
        Returns:
        data of UDPLib message datagram

      • createIsAliveRequestDatagram

        public static byte[] createIsAliveRequestDatagram(Encryptor encryptor)
        Parameters:
        encryptor - Encryptor of sending thread
        Returns:
        data of UDPLib SERVER_IS_ALIVE_REQUEST datagram

      • createIsAliveResponseDatagram

        public static byte[] createIsAliveResponseDatagram(Encryptor encryptor)
        Parameters:
        encryptor - Encryptor of sending thread
        Returns:
        data of UDPLib CLIENT_IS_ALIVE_RESPONSE datagram

      • createUserInfoDatagram

        public static byte[] createUserInfoDatagram(Encryptor encryptor,
                                            GroupUser user)
        Format: HEADER(N bytes)TYPE#NAME|IP|PING_TO_SERVER
        Parameters:
        encryptor - Encryptor of sending thread
        user - user, about whom is this info
        Returns:
        data of UDPLib CLIENT_IS_ALIVE_RESPONSE datagram

      • createUserDeadDatagram

        public static byte[] createUserDeadDatagram(Encryptor encryptor,
                                            GroupUser user)
        Format: HEADER(N bytes)TYPE#NAME|IP
        Parameters:
        encryptor - Encryptor of sending thread
        user - user, about whom is this info
        Returns:
        data of UDPLib SERVER_CLIENT_DEAD datagram

      • createExploreRequest

        public static byte[] createExploreRequest()
        Returns:
        (not encrypted) client request for server to send info about themselves

      • createExploreResponse

        public static byte[] createExploreResponse(boolean requiresPassword)
        Format: HEADER(N bytes)TYPE#PASSWORD(1 byte - 1 - requires password/0)
        Parameters:
        requiresPassword - true, if server requires password
        Returns:
        (not encrypted) Info about server for exploring client

      • createClientAccessRequest

        public static byte[] createClientAccessRequest(Encryptor encryptor,
                                               java.lang.String username,
                                               java.lang.String password)
        Parameters:
        encryptor - Encryptor of sending thread
        username - Client's name in group
        password - Group password
        Returns:
        data of UDPLib CLIENT_ACCESS_REQUEST datagram

      • createServerClientAccessResponse

        public static byte[] createServerClientAccessResponse(Encryptor encryptor,
                                                      java.net.InetAddress groupAddress,
                                                      java.net.InetAddress clientAddress,
                                                      boolean accept)
        HEAD(N B)TYPE#GROUP|USE_PASSWORD
        Parameters:
        encryptor - Encryptor of sending thread
        groupAddress - Group address of sending thread
        clientAddress - IP of client to let him know which interface he should use
        accept - true if recipient is accepted to group
        Returns:
        data of UDPLib SERVER_ACCEPT_CLIENT_RESPONSE datagram

      • createServerFileSharePart

        public static byte[] createServerFileSharePart(Encryptor encryptor,
                                               java.lang.String fileName,
                                               java.lang.String filePart,
                                               int index,
                                               int total)
        HEAD(N B)TYPE#FILENAME#INDEX#TOTAL#PART#
        Parameters:
        encryptor - Encryptor of sending thread
        fileName - - String, under which should be the SharedFile stored in Map
        filePart - - Line or part of line of file to send
        index - - index of this part in array of SharedFile
        total - - count of all parts, which were or will be sent, so client can initialize array of SharedFile
        Returns:
        data of UDPLib SERVER_FILE_SHARE_PART datagram

      • createServerFileShareFinish

        public static byte[] createServerFileShareFinish(Encryptor encryptor,
                                                 java.lang.String fileName)
        HEAD(N B)TYPE#FILENAME#
        Parameters:
        encryptor - Encryptor of sending thread
        fileName - - String, under which should be the SharedFile stored in Map
        Returns:
        data of UDPLib SERVER_FILE_SHARE_FINISH datagram

      • createClientFileSharePartRequest

        public static byte[] createClientFileSharePartRequest(Encryptor encryptor,
                                                      java.lang.String fileName,
                                                      int index)
        HEAD(N B)TYPE#FILENAME#INDEX
        Parameters:
        encryptor - Encryptor of sending thread
        fileName - - String, under which should be the SharedFile stored in Map
        index - - index of filePart, which is client missing
        Returns:
        data of UDPLib CLIENT_FILE_SHARE_PART_REQUEST datagram

      • getDatagramType

        public static DatagramTypes getDatagramType(java.lang.String message)
        Parameters:
        message - Data of datagram returned from unpack()
        Returns:
        DatagramType of this datagram or TRASH

      • isExploreDatagram

        public static boolean isExploreDatagram(java.lang.String message)
        Parameters:
        message - recently received data, which might not be encrypted
        Returns:
        DatagramType of this datagram or TRASH

      • unpack

        public static java.lang.String unpack(byte[] data,
                                      Encryptor encryptor,
                                      java.net.DatagramPacket source)
        Parameters:
        data - received data
        encryptor - class responsible for decrypting
        source - packet with information about data length
        Returns:
        decrypted datagram data without UDPLib header containing datagram type on 0 index

      • unpack2

        public static java.lang.String unpack2(java.lang.String data)
        Follows after unpack(), removes part informing about type of datagram
        Parameters:
        data - previously unpacked data
        Returns:
        data without type of datagram

      • stringToBytes

        public static byte[] stringToBytes(java.lang.String string)
        Parameters:
        string - String to convert
        Returns:
        byte[] containing string with UDPLib encoding

      • bytesToString

        public static java.lang.String bytesToString(byte[] bytes)
        Parameters:
        bytes - byte[] containing string with UDPLib encoding
        Returns:
        string with UDPLib encoding
